title: Update regarding the market leader
story_body:
SHOP.COM Marketplace Inc. (SHOPM) Update: 09:00 EST, March 10, 2023

In a routine filing, SHOP.COM Marketplace Inc. (SHOPM) disclosed the following updates.

Personnel: As previously disclosed, Ms. Sarah Johnson, Vice President of Operations, will assume additional responsibilities for Supply Chain Management, effective immediately.

Marketing: SHOPM has launched a targeted digital advertising campaign focused on enhancing brand awareness among existing customers. The campaign, which commenced on March 5, 2023, is expected to run for a period of six weeks.

Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG): SHOPM has published its 2022 Sustainability Report, which provides an overview of the company's ESG initiatives and progress towards its sustainability goals. The report is available on the company's website.

These updates are in line with SHOPM's ongoing efforts to optimize its operations and maintain its market leadership position.

No further information is available at this time.
